full_description:
Anker 615 USB Power Strip (GaNPrime 65W)

The Anker 615 USB Power Strip comes with a 3 ft (0.9 meter) extension cord and a GaNPrime 65W power output capacity. The small power strip is convenient to bring with you everywhere you go and takes up very little room on your desk or in your suitcase. You can plug in many devices at once from one handy power strip thanks to its two fast-charging USB-C connectors, two AC outlets, and one USB-A port. By using intelligent temperature monitoring, ActiveShield 2.0 improves protection, and a new generation of GaN technology produces a power strip that is both powerful and safe. An easy and adaptable method to charge your gadgets is with the Anker 615 USB Power Strip. With a maximum power output of 65 watts, the Anker power strip can efficiently and quickly charge your phones, tablets, laptops, and other devices. With its two Type-C connectors, one USB-A port, and two AC outlets, this power strip can support up to five devices simultaneously.

65W Type-C Fast Charging

With its 65W USB-C output, the Anker 615 power strip offers sufficient power to charge an extensive array of gadgets, including laptops, tablets, phones, and more. Within just 37 minutes, a MacBook Pro 14" can be charged to 50%.
